name: NINBALL (TORRYDEV Games)
description:
An 80s style game about SOCCER and NINJAS!

A platformer game based on a futuristic neon-style soccer match with robot ninjas.

Shoot the ball in to  your enemy's neon goal to score!

NINBALL Controls:

PURPLE PLAYER:

W = Jump (Hold to change gravity) / Fast fall (When airbone)

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

S = Load Shuriken / Shoot Shuriken / Reverse Shuriken (When shot)

-----------------------------------

BLUE PLAYER:

UpArrow = Jump (Hold to change gravity) / Fast fall (When airbone)

LeftArrow  = Move Left

RightArrow  = Move Right

DownArrow  = Load Shuriken / Shoot Shuriken / Reverse Shuriken (When shot)

-----------------------------------

Esc = Pause

-----------------------------------

EXTRA PLAYERS: (Recommended to remap on controllers)

PURPLE 2 => Num1, Num2, Num3, Num4

BLUE 2 => Num5, Num6, Num7, Num8

PURPLE 3 => F1, F2, F3, F4

BLUE 3 => F5, F6, F7, F8

By Sergi Torrella & Guillem Muñoz
